title: why
body: its been 3 years since I play league at the beginning ok everything was going well but after 3 years in bronze because everyone feed and I can't carry, its would long as I'll be gold 5 max so I was wondering if you could me rise silver 1 and I put more than $500

replies.body:
We don't raise players Rank with payment, that's something you have to do on your own! I know it's a pretty rough ride, i'm actually Bronze 3 myself right now. It doesn't discourage me from jumping into Ranked games and trying to climb though. Trolls are pretty awful and create an awful experience, but reporting them allows us to track them down for review and reform. Their behavior is not something we want taking place in League and with your help we can get our eyes on them. 

Now, an alternative solution for you to climb could be for you to queue up with some friends in Ranked Flex and go from there! It's really fun playing League as a team and more times than others you can create a strategy and game plans to take down the enemy.
What if that payment was my love? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
